div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

p.strong: Home of the Buffaloes and Lady Buffs

div.p: We are excited to announce that our formal groundbreaking for our new school construction will be Monday, March 9th at 2:30 p.m. Please stay after for refreshments in the cafeteria. We will also have an updated video so you can see our plans. Hope to see everyone there!!
Attached is the order form for b-ball playoff shirts. They will be here tomorrow. We will have a limited number, so get your order in soon!! Thank you for supporting the senior class!!

Great game tonight by our Buffaloes!! We beat Lorenzo 33-19 to clinch 3rd place in district and advance to the playoffs!! We will get the details out on that game when they are final. Great job, men and thank you to all the fans for the amazing crowd support and environment!!

The varsity boys basketball team will play Lorenzo on Friday, February 21st at 8:00 p.m. at Lubbock Roosevelt for a play-in game to see who will be 3rd place in district and advance to the playoffs. We will be the visitors. Tickets are $4 for adults and $2 for students.

Petersburg ISD Schools will have a two hour delayed start on Wednesday, February 12th. Classes will begin at 10:00 a.m. We will run our bus route. Breakfast will not be served on the days where we have a late start.
